document.full_text: gov. rick scott vetoed the state's nearly $4.8 million appropriation for public broadcasting, which had already been reduced by 30 percent from the 2010 amount.
document.title: florida governor vetoes pbs funding
lines_and_colors: gov. rick scott vetoed the state's nearly $4.8 million appropriation for public broadcasting, which had already been reduced by 30 percent from the 2010 amount.
